DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess effect multiple oral dos ZD4054 ( Zibotentan ) pharmacokinetics CYP450 3A Probe ( midazolam ) healthy male subject .
DOC.brief_title: Drug Interaction Study Asses Multiple Doses ZD4054 ( Zibotentan )
DOC.criteria: BMI 18 30 kg/m2 Medical surgical history physical examination without clinically significant finding Normal rest ECG QTcB interval < 450ms Definite suspect personal history family history hypersensitivity drug endothelin antagonist ; ie , ambrisentan , artrasentan , sitaxsetan bosentan Healthy volunteer know hypersensitivity midazolam excipients midazolam tablet Medical diagnosis migraine attack 12 month prior Screening
